1.content:
Alright, let's begin. So, what gender are you?
(sorry about short decision chapters, but it's needed to start)
1.title: Starting out.

11.content: So, how old are you?
11.title: You're a guy eh?

111.content: You are just turning 11 years old today. You are excited to start exploring the woods around your house. You mother said that you could do just that on the day you turn 11, which was today! It was around noon when you decided to start exploring. Your mom told you not to wonder off too far, and gave you a cell phone in case you ran into trouble. You start off in your backyard, but now the question became where to go?
111.title: 8-12 years old

1112.content: You were a little intimitaded at first, but you had a cell phone with GPS, and you knew how to work it. You knew that there really wasn't anything to fear, but you still couldn't help feeling nervous. After a few seconds of hesitation, you decide to finally start walking forward. As you entered the forest, you started remembering some of the stories and rumor that had been going around. They were all about a monster that lived in the forest. The monster supposedly didn't like humans and was strong enough to take down a bear with no hastle at all. You knew it was just a story, but you were still freaked out by it. You continued into the forest, still a little nervous, observing all the beautliful nature around you.
1112.title: Right; pretty dense forest

11121.content: Suddenly, you started hearing noises, and your imagination started getting to you again. You didn't know what to do at this point, so you picked up he pace. You could hear the noises following you, and even closing in. You keep running, hoping whatever was following you would find something else to eat. Just then you see the bushes rustle ahead of you, and out jumps a really huge bear! You are now scared to death. You trip and fall right in front of it. It reared up, ready to attack. It swung a huge claw down at you, and you shut your eyes, awaiting the horrible pain. You can hear the bear fighting against something. You don't know what, but you're greatful that whatever it was saved you. Suddenly, you hear the bear run off, and you open your eyes. You see a creature that was about eight feet tall. It was red and had two long plumes of "hair" that were a white-ish color and went down to about it's waist. You've played the pokemon games enough to know that just with those two details, the being standing before you is a Blaziken. You then start to remember that now, those stories you heard are true. You were now sitting in front of the monster from the rumors. You assumed that the Blaziken would turn on you and destroy you, so you try to get up and run. The Blaziken turns to face you and you actually scream in fear. Blaziken looks at you with a bit of annoyance, but mostly sadness. You keep trying to get up and run, but you keep stumbling. Blaziken chuckles, and offers one of his claws to help you up. You back away from it, and run into a tree. Blaziken bends down to your level and...
11121.title: Suddenly you hear a noise!

111211.content: The Blaziken stares at you for a little bit, and does something that you never in amillion years though possible. "Hey. Look... I don't want to hurt you. I don't know why every human that sees me freaks out and runs away. I know I'm bigger than most Blaziken, but that doesn't mean I'm automatically going to hurt you. Come on, I'll help you up and help you get back home ok?" it said as it offers you a claw once more. "YOU CAN TALK?!" you yell. "Heh... Yeah." it smiled back at you. It did seem friendly, so you take ahold of it's claws. You then notice that the Blaziken is...
111211.title: TAlKING BLAZIKEN?!?

choices: You make it home without incident.
1112111.content: Blaziken helps you up to your feet. "So your not afraid of me are you?" he asks. "Well... Not really." you reply. Blaziken just smiles at you. "Good... I can't have you trembling all the way home." he said chuckling. You then notice that you are shaking a little. "Uh... Sorry. Just a little nervous. I never thought I would see a real pokemon before." you tell him. "Its ok. Pretty much every human I come across is afraid of me." he said looking away a little. "I think I can explain why." you say as you tell him about all the rumors going around. " so you all think I'm some sort of monster just waiting to kill you all? I can't believe it..." he said. He sounded sad. "Its ok. I don't think you're a monster anymore... Hey, didn't you say you wanted to help me home?" you ask. "Uh, yeah. Now, which way to your house?" he asks. You laugh a little and point in the right direction. "Alright. Let's go." he said.
1112111.title: Male

choices: You convince her to let Blaziken stay
11121111.content: You arrive home with your new friend. You had been talking with Blaziken for quite some time. You were really enjoying his company, and were beginning to think that this was the best birthday you ever had. You walk back into the house with your giant of a friend following you. Your mom spots you and Blaziken and is nonetheless startled. "Um... Sweetie... What is that thing following you?" she asked as calmly as she could. "My new friend Blaziken. He's really nice and helped me back home. There's no reason to be afraid of him." you say. "He may be your friend but that doesn't mean he can come in the house whenever he wants" your mom said. Blaziken decided to speak up. "I understand... I can leave I just wanted to help your son back home." Blaziken turned to you. "It was nice meeting you, but it looks like I gotta go." he told you looking kinda sad. "Wait." you say as you walk back toward Blaziken. "I think I can convince my mom to let you stay." you tell him. You see Blaziken's face immediatly light up. "You'd do that?" You nod and go back to your mom.
11121111.title: You make it home without incident.

choices: Blaziken follows you home, and is now at least 15 ft tall.
Blaziken's growth keeps you from going further.
11121112.content: You start walking back home with your new friend, when you notice something... off. Was it just you, or was he getting... taller? You couldn't help but feel that something was off. "Hey, Blaziken...?" you ask. "Yeah?" he responds as he looks over at you. "Do you notice anything... I don't know... strange?" you ask. "Well, not really. Why?" he answered. "Something just seemed... off. You look taller to me... I'm not sure why, but you do." you tell him. Blaziken just looks at you confused. "I'm sure it's just your mind playing tricks on you. Come on. How could I have possibly grown at all in the last five minutes?" he asks. "I guess you're right..." you start to say, but you swear you see him grow another inch or two. Blaziken smiles down at you, not even noticing his increase in height. This time though, you say something. "Alright, this time I know you grew." you declare. Blaziken gives you another confused look. "What?" he asks. Just then you seem to shrink compared to him, as he shot up another inch or two. Blaziken just looks down on you, confused and worried. "You ok?" he asks. "Yeah, I'm fine. I'm a little freaked out that you're growing every like two minutes, but other than that, I'm good." you say. Blaziken just looks down at you, worried.
11121112.title: Something happens...

111211121.content:
You continue your walk home with your still growing friend. Blaziken keeps having hiccups of growth all the way home. They seem to stop though when you reach home. Though he now towers over you, he is still as friendly as before. You reach home and you enter your house through the back door. You are greeted by your mother, trying to fill you in on the details of your party for later. She can tell you're distracted as you're usually really excited about this sort of thing.

"What's wrong? You're usually so excited about your party." Your mother says.

"Well..." You say, trying to decide if you should tell your mother about your new friend or not.

"Oh my...." your mother says, knocked speechless as your thoughts are interrupted. Your mother has seen Blaziken in the backyard. Or rather, only up to about his waist. Blaziken hasn't noticed, though. He is standing in your backyard, examining his surroundings. You guess that he's never really been close to a human neighborhood, especially at this size.

"What mom?" you ask.

Your mother just points out the window. You look to see your now really giant friend. He has been growing still. He has now grown to a height of...
111211121.title: Blaziken follows you home, and is now at least ...

choices: A normal sized blaziken cautiously approaching you (male)
A rather large blaziken hugging you to her chest (female)
Nothing... You feel like someone's watching you...
113.content:
Getting lost in a forest is never good.

You trudge forward, looking for any waypoints or signs that might lead you back to the entrance. At least the scenery was nice. Brown leaves slowly fluttered in the soft breeze as you slowly walked, hoping for a way out. For some reason, as soon as you had entered this part of the forest your phone signal had instantly died. You'd tried stepping back a few feet at a time, but the signal remained dead, and you somehow remained in this section of the forest.

No, don't panic. There's a way out, you've just got to find it... There's always a way out...

By now, however, you were exhausted. Seeing a tree that looked suitable for sleeping against, you take of your rucksack and deposit it next to you, before sitting down and leaning against the tree, slowly falling to sleep...

You wake up with a start, feeling somewhat warm. What do you see?
113.title: 18-22 years old

choices: Asks what you're doing out here
Blaziken grows slightly taller and more muscular (kindness = growth)
1131.content:
You sit there and stare at what you believe to be a hallucination. Standing about 20 feet from you is what you make out to be a Blaziken. It looks at you, half curious, half nervously, looking ready to dash away at any danger. You begin to wonder whether this being really saw you as any kind of a threat since it stood at over six feet tall, while you just barely came up 5 foot 6. You could tell it was a male based on its physique. It had broad shoulders, and was bulked up a bit, kinda like a bodybuilder. It seemed strange that it would be so cautious.

Why does it seem to be half scared of me? you begin to wander.

Blaziken then took a step forward, and you jump backward, almost trying to get inside the tree you're backed up against.

Blaziken sees your frightened movements, and instantly the nervousness and curiosity disappear from his eyes, replaced with concern. He moves much more confidently now, however he still moves slowly to try and keep you calm to the best of his ability. Then to your complete and utter shock, you heard him speak.

"Please, it's okay. I won't harm you. I only want to help" the towering beast said as he moved ever closer to you. He was bending down to your level, really giving it his all to not frighten you any further. He realized you didn't have any defense. He was now less than 2 feet from you, kneeling down, looking at you kinda worried.

You merely shiver in fear of what this creature might do to you, which seems to sadden the great beast. The Blaziken slowly reaches out to you, offering a clawed hand. Those claws were awfully sharp, but you managed to stay put. The expression on his face couldn't be lying... it truly looked sad, and almost dejected that you feared him so much.

You shakily reached out, and took the clawed hand in yours, causing a small smile to appear on Blaziken's face. You still didn't trust him completely, but you had a feeling that he really didn't mean any harm.

Blaziken then helps you to your feet, and then...
1131.title: A normal sized blaziken cautiously approaching ...

choices: The blaziken lead you somewhere else
11313.content: You say thanks to the blazikin. The blaziken nods a smiles a worried smile it's still look afraid. You then briefly wonder why the blaziken I still scared of you before you ask a question. Hey I'm little but lost in this forest can you help me find a way out. The blaziken stops for bit starts thinks before it nods its head a gestures to follow him.
11313.title: Offers to help you out.

choices: You question her over her existence, trying to find answers.
You talk to her, asking as to how to get out of this large forest.
You leave after thanking her, still confused.
1132.content:
You blush a deep red, now realizing what's going on. You look up at her in both confusion and embarrassment.

"W-why're you hugging me?"

She looks down and smiles, then lets go of you. Standing up, she's definitely taller than you - a little under seven feet, as a guess. She has large D-sized breasts, and some wide hips.

"I just thought you were cold, is all. You were shivering in your sleep..."

"Th-thanks, I guess..." you said, still confused. How could she be real, and look like that, too?
1132.title: A rather large blaziken hugging you to her chest..

12.content: So, how old are ya?
12.title: You're a lady eh?

info.brief_description: You live with a blaziken, though it won't be normal sized for long.
info.description:
You are living with a Blaziken who doesn't want to stay normal sized. Blaziken can grow by any means possible, but he\she must be gentle (sorry if that ruins it for you, but not everyone is into evil giants.) Yes the Blaziken can be female. Anyway I guess I should lay down some rules.

1- Blaziken MUST be gentle/friendly no matter what.

2- Blaziken can grow to any size.

3- Types if growth
-Giant/Giantess
-Muscle growth
-Weight gain
-ANY part if his/her body (including breast and dick growth if you REALLY want it <.<)

4- If you MUST have sex, keep it to the bare minimum

5- No killing

6- stepping on/laying on is fine, but victim must not die unless the victim is evil

7- please have propper grammar and spelling (even if I misspell sometimes...) just make sure it's readable.

Well, that's it! This is my first interactive, so go easy on me ^^; Anyway, have fun!
